'''''Emergency Brakes, Teteocan Style''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to use the sprint ability of a Tatankasaurus or a Collective of Plenty character to collide with a [[Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel]] when it performs its Rolling Charge attack.
